Interface Feature

public interface Feature
A feature in the formula once bound to a schema. A feature returns a single value when applied to a data object (e.g. Tuple).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default ValueVector
    apply(DataFrame data)
    Applies the term on a data frame.
    Object
    apply(Tuple tuple)
    Applies the term on a tuple.
    default boolean
    applyAsBoolean(Tuple tuple)
    Applies the term on a data object and produces a boolean-valued result.

    Returns the metadata of feature.
    default boolean
    isVariable()
    Returns true if the term represents a plain variable/column in the data frame.
